plot: Lotta at Liseberg is a live music show with singalong with the audience from the amusement park Liseberg in Gothenburg. During the first two seasons they also played bingo in the program but the game was removed to the third season.
plot_en: Lotta at Liseberg is a live music show with singalong with the audience from the amusement park Liseberg in Gothenburg. During the first two seasons they also played bingo in the program but the game was removed to the third season.
plot_es: Lotta at Liseberg is a live music show with singalong with the audience from the amusement park Liseberg in Gothenburg. During the first two seasons they also played bingo in the program but the game was removed to the third season.
title: Lotta på Liseberg
